intro.paragraph1: I-Orbital Temple iyisathelayithi enomsebenzi wobuciko: isikhumbuzo esisemkhathini esivulekele wonke umuntu onomuzwa wokuthi ophila noma owake waphila eMhlabeni.
intro.paragraph2: Ngezindlela zobuchwepheshe, noma ubani angathumela igama lomuntu eThempelini, umuntu owashona, umuntu ophila kakhulu, nanoma yisiphi isidalwa esifanele ukukhunjulwa.

sculpture.heading: UMfanekiso
sculpture.paragraph1: Umsebenzi wobuciko unezici ezintathu ezincike ngokubambisana: isathelayithi eklanyelwe ukugcina izigidigidi zamagama; isithombe esiqoshiwe somphakathi esishintshanisa ulwazi ngesathelayithi; kanye nesizindalwazi ababambiqhaza abathumela ngayo amagama, kusukela manje kuze kube yilapho sebedlulile emhlabeni, ezulwini.
sculpture.paragraph2: Njengomzamo wemikhakha eminingi, iThempeli le-Orbital lingabhekwa njengesifanekiso esiqondene nesayithi, indawo yokuhlala. Kuphinde kube yiphrojekthi ye-Artsat.

antenna.heading: I-Antenna Njengesithombe Esiqoshiwe Somphakathi
antenna.paragraph2: I-antenna ezoba ukuxhumana okuqondile nesathelayithi ye-orbital iyaklanywa.
antenna.paragraph3: Ngobuso obukhazimulayo obusagolide, obubonisa isibhakabhaka ngaphezu kwayo, kuyisiqalo sokushukunyiswa okukhulu (noma ubudlelwano bethu nalokho 'okuphezulu lapho').
antenna.paragraph4: Nakuba izithombe ezibaziweyo zingafakiwe ezingxenyeni eziningi zomhlaba, amaFramu ethu avela eMhlabeni, okuyimanje alawula isathelayithi, athumela amagama endaweni ngayinye yokudlula.
antenna.paragraph5: Siza ukuletha lo mbono edolobheni lakhoâ€”ukufaka izithombe eziqoshiwe ze-antenna ezikhuthaza izingxoxo mayelana nokuhlola indawo, ubuciko, kanye nendawo yethu esabelene ngayo endaweni yonke. Funda kabanzi mayelana nokusekela iphrojekthi .
